notes.text: We have resolved a timing issue with side effects for virtual field groups

We now provide an option for application developers to freeze the first n columns in a grid and analytical table. You can now freeze the first columns in a table so that they don't move when scrolling the table horizontally
We now correctly handle the criticality annotation when the navigation target is set in the manifest
You can now create Integration cards from the analytical list page and add them to the Insights section
You can now disable the option AddCardToInsights in the manifest
We now offer a 'Share as card' option in Microsoft Teams
We now support the creation of insights cards from list report tables.
In collaboration mode, when the user wants to navigate to a draft that no longer exists, we now redirect to the version that was saved by another user in the meantime
We now ensure the list report table doesn't remain in the busy state after closing the group message dialog
We've now removed the empty content container from Parameterized Filter Bar
We now provide backward compatibility for Aggregation.Aggregatable annotation
We now ensure that the description title does not appear on the message dialog
We no longer show the busy indicator when a user clicks the ‘Apply’ button on a subobject page
We've resolved the issue related to displaying the Delete button on the object page
We now process the InitialLoad setting correctly for control-level variant management
The computed fields label within an empty table row is now empty
: Enhanced changeset logic to avoid showing technical messages with incomplete details in strict handling scenarios
You can now delete draft-enabled entities with no delete restrictions
We've now enabled the filtering on draft-related properties by default
Failed requests are properly discarded when canceling a draft in the flexible column layout
We now ensure that URL parameters are correctly encoded while navigating using a breadcrumb link or shell navigation
We now correctly display the DataFieldWithUrl annotation on a table
We now support SideEffects with multiple SourceProperties for the MultiValueField in a virtual field group
Clicking Cancel in the confirmation popup for critical actions on an object page now ensures the user returns to the list report
We now provide triggerSearch as a public API for the FilterBar building block
The table row items in a list report are now navigable as expected
We now ensure that we check the required conditions from the FilterBar along with inParameters for visual filter
We now show the label instead of the technical name in a message when the inParameter value is missing for a visual filter
The Continue button of create actions is now always enabled
We now show the Draft discarded message toast only for draft enabled applications
We've now added the commonly used currencies and modified the sample names of the filter bar in the flexible programming model explorer
The error message that used to come up while discarding a new object in sticky mode is not displayed now
Creation row now works as expected when a dynamic updateRestriction is used
We now support the usage of placeholders in the action parameter dialog
We now manage the runtime building block with an event associated to a CommandExecution to ensure tooltips are correctly displayed for all buttons
You can now overwrite specific keys using the custom i18n approach
We now display the correct header title for the message popover in the singular form
